title: Bug 2345 [Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345 [Editor Management] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file is already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When selecting a file 'test.xml' in the Navigator and choosing 'Open With' -> 'Default Text Editor', nothing happens. The file remains open in the current editor (scripted resource editor example) instead of opening in a new editor as expected.
SR:
1. Create a new basic project
2. Create a new file 'test.xml'
3. The default editor used for 'test.xml' is the scripted resource editor example, which ignores the XML file content
4. Select 'test.xml' in the Navigator
5. Right-click and choose 'Open With' -> 'Default Text Editor'
6. Observe that the file remains in the scripted resource editor instead of opening in a new text editor
